titleStmt.title: Hiren: or The faire Greeke: By William Barksted, one of the seruants of his Maiesties reuels
titleStmt.author: Barksted, William, fl. 1611.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Roger Barnes, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery lane, ouer against the Rolles,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Chancery lane, ouer against the Rolles
